item.title: Loggout Thing
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

[quote=“Miix Tom, post:1, topic:228839”]What is wrong with this one?

public void logout(){ savemoreinfo(); outStream.createFrame(109); if(playerRights >= 0){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged out"; else if(playerRights >= 1); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Mod playerName+ has logged out"; else if(playerRights >= 2), PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin playerName+ has logged out"; else if(playerRights >= 3); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Super Admin playerName+ has logged out"; else if(playerRights >= 9); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner playerName+ has logged out"; } } }
does it work at all?[/quote]

Add these at the top, below the savemoreinfo,

disconnected = true; savecharinfo();

Read full topic

item.title: Loggout Thing
item.dc:creator: @spon80 spon80
item.description:
@spon80 wrote:

heres my code

[code] public void logout(){
outStream.createFrame(109);
if(playerRights == 3)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “owner " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Spon80”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“b00merang3r”))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Spon80 " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Spon80”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ultima”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Sinister”))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Spon80 " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
else if (playerRights == 2)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Admin " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
else if (playerRights == 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Modarator " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
else if (playerIsMember == 0)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “loser " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
else if (playerIsMember == 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Member " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
}

public void customCommand(String command) {
	actionAmount++;

command.replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.trim();
[/code]

hope it works

Read full topic

item.title: Loggout Thing

item.description:
@Miix_Tom wrote:

What is wrong with this one?

public void logout(){ savemoreinfo(); outStream.createFrame(109); if(playerRights >= 0){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged out"; else if(playerRights >= 1); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Mod playerName+ has logged out"; else if(playerRights >= 2), PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin playerName+ has logged out"; else if(playerRights >= 3); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Super Admin playerName+ has logged out"; else if(playerRights >= 9); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner playerName+ has logged out"; } } }
does it work at all?
